tool_description: Collects comprehensive information about suppliers including ratings, policies, and service quality for bathroom fixture purchases.

supplier_names.description: List of supplier names to gather information about

error_messages: Supplier not found: One or more supplier names are not recognized in the database
Too many suppliers: Maximum 12 suppliers can be processed at once
Information unavailable: Some supplier information may be incomplete or outdated
usage: Provide an array of supplier_names to research. Enable include_reviews and include_policies for comprehensive supplier evaluation.

supplier_ratings.description: Array of overall supplier ratings from 1-5 stars

delivery_ratings.description: Array of delivery service ratings from 1-5 stars

customer_service_ratings.description: Array of customer service ratings from 1-5 stars

return_policies.description: Array of return policy summaries for each supplier

shipping_options.description: Array of available shipping options for each supplier
